revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_MoveToSpot}} {{Special|86|po, speed, target|Polyobject|MoveToSpot}}
Moves a polyobject in a straight line towards a given destination.
* ''po'': polyobj to move * ''speed'': how quickly the polyobject should move, in map units per [[octic]]. * ''target'': the tid of the [[:Category:Map spot|spot]] to which the polyobject should move.
==See also== * [[PolyObjects]] * [[Polyobj_MoveTo]] * [[Polyobj_OR_MoveTo]] * [[Polyobj_OR_MoveToSpot]]
